Tools, libs

game-sprite – the professional library for javascript game sprite
react-slug – a react component that will turn any input into a url friendly slug
antwar – a static site generator built with react and webpack
template-helpers – generic javascript helpers that can be used with any template engine
canvasBlurRect – real-time (30+ fps) ios-style box blur + saturation with html5 canvas
react-blog – isomorphic reactjs/flux blog engine
grunt-warn-friday – grunt to warn developers of a Friday deployment
react-headroom – hide your header until you need it
xr – ultra-simple wrapper around XMLHttpRequest
markmin.js – yet another wiki markup language
ngWebAudio – angular module for playing audio using the webaudio api
fuzzysearch – tiny and blazing-fast fuzzy search in javascript
react-pstate – persistence of the state of react component
shipboard – build and plan software projects in tiny pieces
ngLoader – loading animation for angular
mac – hybrid desktop app build tools for meteor
to-fast-properties – force V8 to use fast properties for an object
nock – http mocking and expectations library
eyeglass – npm modules for sass
react-resolver – isomorphic library to recursively lazy-load data for react components
jQuery.imgx – extension for serving hi-res images on desktop/mobile
unorphan – removes text orphans
AngularTypeScript – an angular and typescript demo app that integrates with Azure AD and Office 365 cloud services
